_source.text: 4GB on DVD... Better than a movie, screensaver or books on Mars, Venus, Jupiter, Saturn... Covers the years 2004-2007 of the MER Spirit Mission.

text: 4GB on DVD... **Better** **than** a movie, screensaver or books on **Mars**, Venus, Jupiter, Saturn... Covers the years 2004-2007 of the MER **Spirit** Mission.
